metadata.title: CVE-2024-26751 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ARM: ep93xx: Add terminator to gpiod_lookup_tableWithout the terminator, if a con_id is passed to gpio_find() thatdoes not exist in the lookup table the function will not stop loopingcorrectly, and eventually cause an oops.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
